CustomField.description: Color/icon used to better visualize the current Portfolio Health field value.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( agf__Portfolio_Health__c , "Not Started", "/img/alohaSkin/setup/setup_selected_bottombg.png", "On Track", "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Watch", "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "Blocked", "/img/samples/color_red.gif", "Completed", "/img/checkbox_checked.gif", "Canceled", "/img/checkbox_unchecked.gif", "On Hold", "/img/alohaSkin/help_grey.png", "/s.gif"), "status color",15,30)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Color/icon used to better visualize the current Portfolio Health field value.
CustomField.label: Portfolio Health Color
